concept.title: What are private keys?
concept.shortdesc: Private keys are a crucial part of how crypto assets work. In this article you will learn what they are.

section.title: What are Private Keys? (Private Key Definition)
section.p: Private keys in the context of blockchain assets prove ownership of assets associated with a particular wallet address and allow you to access and spend the assets in that address. Every address that you create, or own, has its own private key.

i.b: An easy way to think about private keys is by using the analogy of a bank.

p.i: If your wallet is like your online banking account, your private key is the login for the account, allowing you to go in and spend your money as you please.

section.p: Therefore, in the same way that you want to keep your online banking information safe, you must keep your private keys safe. Otherwise, anyone with the keys can “login” (access) your “account” (wallet) and drain it of your funds!
